name: Infinity Wars
description:
80 billion years of peace and prosperity are in danger, the higher realms wage war for control at dimension Evo. The corrupt scourge have activated the oblivion gateway to continue their advances against the higher realms. The Gods have chosen to defend their dimension by summoning & possessing Varice, the personification of the reaper of death.

Command army forces, capture soul fountains, cast magical spells and attack enemies to end the encroaching scourge. Stop the corrupt gods at the edge of destruction! This is the last war before ‘Infinity Wars’ begins.

Content:

-10 different soldier types with custom A.I. designed for each character

-Soldiers

-Archers

-Spiders

-Griffons

-Dragons

-Grunts

-Grunt shooters

-Centaurs

-Trolls

-”Secret Boss”

-Over 12 spells with high definition FX

-Custom made interior and exterior levels

-Awesome main character who is combat ready

-Control A.I.

-Choose to summon various characters and plan your strategy

-Upgrade armies and abilities

-Purchase new spells with souls

More content for future updates will be posted here:

-Exploding enemy type (COMPLETED)

-New character types

-New spells

-Different damage types (Physical, Magical, Fire, Holy etc.)

-Improved ragdoll physics
